page.title: 03WALSGRAVE AREA VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: Walsgrave started off as a little village.It had a school,a church and a few houses.The place itself is quiet and clean.Nowadays there are lots of modern houses and shops and a high population.There are no buses around the modern area of Walsgrave but two buses go round the new hospital and three pass the church.Traffic has increased because there is a direct route through Walsgrave to the motorway.The old school was pulled down and a new school has taken its place across the road from the old one.A big new superstore called Asda was built in 1982 with everything from a spark plug to a dozen eggs.The air in the area is clean,helping us to keep healthy.This is because there are not many factories or places where smoke comes out.
